name: api_versioning
description: Validates that API versioning follows Solace REST API conventions as per ADR

conditions.message: API version MUST be included in the URL path as /api/v{major}/
Major version changes MUST be made when there are breaking changes
Minor version changes MUST be made when there are non-breaking changes
Patch version changes MUST be made when there are bug fixes
Version MUST be included in the API documentation
